reviews.review_msg: Pros: Tries her best to cater to students, super sweet!, approachable, generous grader (particularly recognizes effort)-- overall, a genuinely lovely individual Cons: She does assign tons of reading-- but would definitely not expect you to regurgitate rando info
AWESOME PROF! Her method of teaching stimulate students to think deeply about the content. I would love to take another class with her if possible!
Is there for students and helps them according to the level of help each student need!
